stems_affixes.word_buile: a无+centric[[adj.中心的]]行牡摹鷄dj.无中心的
centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ec出+centric[[adj.中心的]]→adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人
ego自我+centric[adj.中心的]→adj.自我中心的,利己的
xeno外国+centric[adj.中心的]→adj.喜爱外国之文化的
centre[n.中心, 中央 v.集中]→n.中心
centr中心+e→n.中心, 中央 v.集中
concentrate[v.集中;浓缩]+ion动作或状态→concentration集中;浓缩
ec出+centric[[adj.中心的]]→adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人
eccentric[adj.古怪的,怪癖的,异乎寻常的n.古怪的人]+ity表名词→n.反常,怪癖
de离开+central[adj.中心的]+ize表动词→离开中心
centr中心+e→n.中心, 中央 v.集中
con共同+centr中心+ate做→中心共同→集中

mean.mean: 最重要的；首要的；主要的

entry.def: Something that is central is in the middle of a place or area.

example.ex: The disruption has now spread and is affecting a large part of central Liberia.
example.tran: 混乱局面已经扩散，正在影响利比里亚中部的大片地区。

entry.def: A place that is central is easy to reach because it is in the centre of a city, town, or particular area.
entry.tran: 位于中央地带的;处于中心的;四通八达的

entry.def: A central group or organization makes all the important decisions that are followed throughout a larger organization or a country.
entry.tran: 中央的;有最高决策权的

example.ex: There is a lack of trust towards the central government in Rome.
example.tran: 人们对罗马的中央政府缺乏信任。

example.ex: ...the central committee of the Cuban communist party.
example.tran: 古巴共产党中央委员会

entry.def: The central person or thing in a particular situation is the most important one.

example.ex: Black dance music has been central to mainstream pop since the early '60s.
example.tran: 自上世纪60年代以来，黑人舞曲一直是主流流行乐的核心。

means.word_mean: 1. a workplace that serves as a telecommunications facility where lines from telephones can be connected together to permit communication

sentences.sentence: "an example that was fundamental to the argument"
"computers are fundamental to modern industrial structure"

means.word_mean: 2. in or near a center or constituting a center; the inner area;
3. used in the description of a place that in the middle of another place;

sentences.sentence: "the people of Central and Northern Europe"

means.word_mean: 4. centrally located and easy to reach;

sentences.sentence: "the central city has good bus service"
